flavorText: An echo of an ancient weapon, forged from a memory of cunning.
Burn the world. Burn it all.
"Cryptarchs made a crystal that starts fires? Get me one. I don't care how you do it. Go!" â€”Cayde-6

flavorText: A gift for the empress who has everything.
"Victory is not in the unmaking of an enemy, but in the re-making of an enemy into your blade." â€”9th Understanding, 7th Revision of Sorrow
"Nothing kills a Guardian faster than another Guardian." â€”The Drifter
Let fly my sting.
Write the future into the present.

flavorText: "Folding was never an option." â€”Cayde-6
"I respect what I cannot steal from and you cannot take from the dark." â€”Excerpt from an old Eliksni salvage manifest
The danger within is repulsive to us.
~directive = KILL while enemies = PRESENT: execute(directive)~
"Untamed. Destructive. As forceful and chaotic as Ymir himself." â€”Ada-1
Vanguard policy still urges Guardians to destroy this weapon on sight.
"So all being is a one and only being; and that it continues to be when someone dies, tells you, that he did not cease to be." â€”Schrodinger's epitaph
An echo of an ancient weapon, forged from a memory of ambition.
There are things colder than cold.
"It's warm in here."
"Don't fret. It's a simple expedition. We'll be back before lunch." â€”Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath
"I couldn't afford to miss. Not when it was his life on the line." â€”Marin Mansanas, Tangled Outrider
YOU, A CHAMPION OF WAR, STANDARD-BEARER OF VIOLENCE, LET YOUR MARCH BE ENDLESS.
Is your Light bright enough to stand in full gaze of the Hive's abyss?

flavorText: Fear neither dreams nor teeth.
Please replace these components if use causes fatal damage: HEAT SINK. MAGAZINE. OPERATOR.
"â€¦is where you seek it." â€”Lomar
"You are not welcome."
Select application: Ballistic engagement. Entrenching tool. Avionics trawl. Troll smasher. Stellar sextant. List continues.
"â€¦I love my job."
The latest Omolon engineering leverages liquid fuel as coolant to keep weapon systems at biting subzero temperatures.
From the many wings of ruin blows a wind that will reshape this dead world.
â€œIf there is beauty in destruction, why not also in its delivery?â€ â€” Feizel Crux
"Yours, until the last flame dies and all words have been spoken." â€”Shin Malphur to you, as you journey forth into the unknown
This might sting a little.
I dive to understand.

flavorText: Lay those unquiet thoughts to rest.
Ingenuity. Desperation. A haphazard prototype of terrible power. Such were the factors at play in the Wardcliff Incident.
"Because three heads are good, but four are better." â€”Jeza "Jeopardy" Verlayn
A single word etched onto the inside of the weapon's casing: Now.
It's not a holdout weapon; it's a pathfinder.
Silent. Silent. Silent.
displaySource: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

flavorText: "In the Cabal legend, a hero seeks to possess the sun. He succeeds. Then, he becomes Emperor. The Cabalâ€¦ are not a subtle people." â€”Tyra Karn
It's not over until the vast red artificial intelligence sings.
"Let them feel every lash, every curse, every touch of malice that they first dealt to me." â€”Eris Morn
"One day, you will mold the world to your liking, dear brother, as I always have." â€”Queen Mara Sov
Omolon's newest breakthrough uses focused sonic waves to superheat electrons into a devastating energy beam.
"All we have left now is our faith."
A single strike can alter the course of history.
A Guardian's power makes a rich feeding ground. Do not be revolted. There are parasites that may benefit the hostâ€¦ teeth sharper than your own.
Breakthrough, or broken?

flavorText: A Guardian's power makes a rich feeding ground. Do not be revolted. There are parasites that may benefit the hostâ€¦ teeth sharper than your own.
Despite the Breakers' treachery, Her Majesty still stands.
I can be anyone you wish, o murderer mine.
"The Red Legion will march again." â€”Caiatl
"We didn't have linear fusions in the Dark Age. But we made it work." â€”The Drifter
A new chapter for an old legend.

flavorText: "Long, short, they all end the same way." â€”Katabasis
Vestiges of the Queen's Harbingers yet linger among Saturn's moons.
"Sing them a lullaby of death and nothing more."
Nothin' in the world that 30 rounds can't solve.
I know your name.
"Like a one-man private security company." â€”The Drifter
We are small, but we are legion.
"Stick to wall, ground, humanâ€¦ then FFFFFRRRRRYYYYY! Hehehehehehehe." â€”Siviks, Lost to None
"I want to see it all, unhindered, and know it's mine to take." â€”Clovis Bray
"The final stand is wherever I plant my feet. Not one step more." â€”Saint-14
An echo of an ancient weapon, forged from a memory of strength.
Every hit blazes the path to our reclamation.
"Cast a Shadow over the wilds of this universe. Return with glorious trophies." â€”Emperor Calus
They return to moons devoid. Their eyes searching. It's just begun. Meet this storm of sound and fury, till thunder-clashes fade to silence.
Adorably murderous.
"Constant projections. Unending destruction. The will of every efficient parasite." â€”SavathÃ»n's worm
A gift for the empress who has everything.
"If you believe your weapon wants to end all existence, then so it will." â€”Toland the Shattered
Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.
There are too many ways to kill someone who needs killing.
These ancient ceremonial pistols can be dated back to the early Golden Age. A faded inscription reads, "To Sigrun, from Victor."
"Can't outrun the sunrise." â€”Liu Feng

We walk where our ancestors once walked.
Don't slip or you'll hurt yourself. A lot.

flavorText: And they came to a lake fair and broad. "Lo," said the voice, "yonder is the blade that I spoke of."
displaySource: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

flavorText: The flit of tiny wings; the pull of a trigger.
Thank you for using the Data Analysis, Reconnaissance, and Cooperative Intelligence device. You may call me Darci.
Light is a spectrum. Why limit yourself to a single hue?
"Shame. Guilt. Fear. We all bear them. Gather your regrets, purge them as best you can. Let your enemies feel the weight of your burdens." â€”Ada-1
Three points, pushed through forever.
Perhaps The Final Shape is not silence, it is a symphony.
They return from fields afar. The eye has passed, the end nears. Do not fade quietly. Let thunder reign again.
You will dream of meâ€¦ I will never leave youâ€¦
"I've forgotten so much of my past life, of my family. But when I hold this rifle, everything feels right. I feel likeâ€¦ I'm home." â€”Ana Bray
"My mother had a shotgun we called the Chaperone. Kept us alive out there before we got to the City." â€”Amanda Holliday
By this right alone do I rule.
According to official Vanguard policy, this weapon does not exist.
"The question becomes whether or not to fire, not where to aim." â€”Osiris
The last thing the Vex ever heardâ€”the grinding wails of a vicious Banshee.
"What The Witness gave me, I give to you. May it serve you in death, or in finality. It cannot be both." â€”Rhulk, disciple of the Witness
There must be meaning in my roar.
A light in the dark.
"I call it the Zhang Fei. It hits almost as hard as I do." â€”Wei Ning
"Some things should stay buried."
The monolith is hewn; the monument is built.
"In the Cabal legend, a hero seeks to possess the sun. He succeeds. Then, he becomes Emperor. The Cabalâ€¦ are not a subtle people." â€”Tyra Karn
Property of Ishtar Collective. WARNING: Gravity propulsor beam can cause serious injury or even death.
"Wings flutter. Beauty distracts. Poison injects. The butterfly's curse extends to your enemies. A short life, shortened further by your hand." â€”Ada-1
Think of space-time as a tapestry on a loom. This weapon is the needle.
"The eye remains open. The Lighthouse remains lit." â€”Brother Vance
"Long, short, they all end the same way." â€”Katabasis
A volley of solutions to any disruption.
Suffering to the conquered.

flavorText: A voice. A choice. An invitation.
Potentia ex nihilo.
"Weapon system no longer explodes when trigger is pulled." â€”Prototype 7.2.1 Revision Notes
"His life brought peace to the Reef. His death brings a sword." â€”Crows of the Black Hull
"I have heralded disaster so often that my mere presence is an omen. So be it." â€”Eris Morn
"Press on! The Devils will rue the day they came to our doors!" â€”Lord Shaxx

flavorText: ~directive = KILL while enemies = PRESENT: execute(directive)~
"What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"
Stalk thy prey and let loose thy talons upon the Darkness.
Shallow graves give way to old vendettas and hungry claims.
We outnumber you. We will find you. You are alone, and we are colony.
"To rend one's enemies is to see them not as equals, but objectsâ€”hollow of spirit and meaning." â€”13th Understanding, 7th Book of Sorrow
"Duality is not a curse, but a gift." â€”Author unknown
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=complete. MIDNIGHT EXIGENT: Status=still in progress.
There will always be paths to tread and methods to try. Roll with it.
Calibrate reality. Seek inevitability. Embody divinity.
Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.
"You don't know how long I've been looking for you."
"I have peered through the eye of Chronos to divine humanity's path into the future." â€”Soteria, the Augurmind
Entropy is inevitable.
We all owe our existence to one singular moment, long ago.
The inscription, written in a Cabal dialect, reads: "Inexorable victory."
â€¦a causal loop within the weapon's mechanism, suggesting that the firing process somehow binds space and time intoâ€¦
Three words. Carved by hand: Affinity. Altruism. Awareness.
